items.title: Hemispheres in Glass
items.alt: An ethereal pomegranate sliced in half floating inside a glass cube with soft lighting.

items.title: Seed Nebula
items.alt: Close-up macro of glistening pomegranate seeds arranged like a cosmic cluster.

items.title: Chrono Bloom
items.alt: 3D rendered pomegranate unfolding with clockwork mechanics underneath the rind.

items.title: Luminous Peel Study
items.alt: Minimalist illustration of a pomegranate peel gradient fading into white.

items.title: Scarlet Pulse
items.alt: Long exposure photograph capturing juice droplets suspended mid-air.

items.title: Orbiting Arils
items.alt: Circular arrangement of pomegranate seeds orbiting a glowing sphere in 3D.
